employmentHistory.description:
I started my career here as an intern for 3 months developing my first website (autopesuhinnat.com) from scratch at just only 17 years old. I was instantly offered a part-time position after the internship and moved to an apprenticeship position on my last year of school. It's a small firm so I worked on a variety of different technologies which helped fast track my learning a lot.
After finishing my conscript military service in June, 2021, I was offered a full time position and was given responsibility of a big project including working face-to-face with clients on a daily basis.

education.degree: Vocational Qualification in Business Information Technology
education.description: I graduated with good grades and on time. 2,84 / 3
